main_address_raw_text: 2227 first avenue south suite 100 birmingham, alabama 35233
short_description: walding is a bankruptcy attorney based in birmingham, alabama, united states.
long_description: walding, llc was founded in 2009 in the midst of an economic downturn. from the ashes of a ravaged economy, the firm was forged through the initial expertise of brian walding in the realm of bankruptcy, foreclosure and creditor's rights and workouts. soon thereafter, donna byrd joined the firm bringing the deep educational background of not only a law degree, but an ll.m. in taxation. byrd's experience in structuring complex commercial transactions, formation of corporate entities, bankruptcy and wills and estates bolstered the firm's ability to nimbly adjust to the needs of its clients. walding, llc is a boutique commercial law firm with broad experience across all aspects of issues facing commercial clients. with a foundation in bankruptcy representation and distressed financial situations, its attorneys are able to foresee future problems from the inception of a relationship and utilize this foresight to hedge against future risk for its clients. whether a commercial relationship is just beginning in the formation of a corporate entity, or unravelling with the pursuit of a borrower in bankruptcy court, walding, llc has the experienced attorneys that are capable of meeting any challenge your company may face.
business_tags: attorneys at law | legalization services | wills & estates planning | bankruptcy & foreclosure | will & estates | bankruptcy representation | experienced attorneys | taxation issues | bankruptcy court | corporate litigation | commercial law | law firm expertise | commercial litigation | personal property | law firms | chemical engineering | major league soccer
generated_description: walding, legally known as walding llc., is a boutique commercial law firm based in birmingham, alabama. founded in 2009, the firm specializes in bankruptcy, foreclosure, creditor's rights, and workouts. it also provides legal services in corporate transactions, litigation, and estate planning. the firm was established by brian r. walding, who initially focused on bankruptcy and creditor's rights, and later joined by donna k. byrd, who added expertise in complex commercial transactions and taxation. in 2011, e. bryan nichols joined the firm, bringing a background in chemical engineering to corporate litigation and environmental issues. walding llc serves both commercial clients and individuals, offering comprehensive legal solutions across various legal areas.
